body:
Hi Everybody, I tried to construct a very simple energy model for my exercise, unfortunately I did not succeed E+ simulation with honeybee. When I ran the simulation it said: "1. The simulation has not run correctly because of this severe error:
** Severe ** DetermineShadowingCombinations: There are 2 surfaces which are casting surfaces and are non-convex.
" I don't really understand what it tried to tell me. I am assuming that there is something wrong with my honeybee model. Could anyone help me please! Please find an attachment of my Grasshopper file. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/A22HvZ-IoXUiiUdyPqRgaklmHNS7uh7y2TSpFxUiQzR1XK-X0JDb61OmroI9o4KYB0P2sgQbqDfo9q0BHvDnMmFmkvFs7MEV/ENERGYMODEL.gh)
Atta
